title: Will it ever stop
text:
When Bob was in library in University of Warsaw he saw on one of  facades caption :"Will it ever stop?" and below some mysterious code:while n > 1
  if n mod 2 = 0 then
    n := n / 2
  else
    n := 3 * n + 3Help him finding it out !InputIn first line one number n â‰¤ 1014.OutputPrint "TAK" if program will stop, otherwise print "NIE"ExampleInput:4Output:TAK
sample_input:
while n > 1
  if n mod 2 = 0 then
    n := n / 2
  else
    n := 3 * n + 3
